Inc.","details":"Use cases:      - Rule 144 affiliate determination      - Section 16 insider tracking      - Different transfer restrictions for affiliates vs non-affiliates      - Control person monitoring      This module doesn't restrict transfers itself - it provides affiliate      status data that other modules (like VolumeLimitModule) can query to      apply different rules.      An \"affiliate\" is typically:      - Officers, directors, or control persons      - Anyone owning 10%+ of voting securities      - Entities controlled by the
